info.author: Francesco Palumbo
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 or later (GPLv3+)
info.description: A basic configuration file parser module for Python. It is a simple function which takes a file path, a dictionary of rules (regex based), an optional key-value separator (default is '='), an optional character to identify lines which start with a comment (default '#'), and returns a dictionary containing parsed data. No sections or others things are required. The eventually rised exceptions contain error line number.
info.name: basicconfigparser
info.summary: A basic configuration file parser module for Python.
info.html_description: A basic configuration file parser module for Python. It is a simple function which takes a file path, a dictionary of rules (regex based), an optional key-value separator (default is ‘=’), an optional character to identify lines which start with a comment (default ‘#’), and returns a dictionary containing parsed data. No sections or others things are required. The eventually rised exceptions contain error line number.
